title: I have received 4 win ip boost
body:
I have participated 2 tournament over the weekend and I also won a 4 win ip boosts from doing opltip.com

I have received 1 set of 4 win ip boosts, but i am not sure which of the above it is from.

Is there a way to check that? and does that 4 win ip boosts stack?

replies.body:
Best way to figure this out is to [contact support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). But I'll help you in this instance.

The one you got over the weekend was due to a perfect round of tipping in the OPL, and yes IP boosts do stack. :)
